name: Rolling Balls (Syllight)
description:
Note: "If you mess-up the level, you can always restart by pressing 'R' " This is the game that I made for the "Size does matter" gamejam.

The basic controls are 'A' and 'D' to move left and right.

Unlock the door and enter (press spacebar near the opened door) to go to the next level.

Note that if you're bigger than the enemy, the enemy can be killed. But if you're smaller that the enemy, you die.

Doors only unlocks according to the player's size.

eg: - If the door is small, then the player must be the small as well (The player must also have the key).
